data.actual_result: Your message will be sent, but the New messages red separator will appear above your message
data.expected_result: Your message will be sent, and nothing else will appear
data.short_description: When someone sends a message and then deletes it in a channel with no other unreads messages, the next message you will send will make the New messages red separator appear above your message.
data.steps_to_repro: - Pick any text channel. Also works with DMs - Read messages in it, or mark it as Read - exit out of the channel - have someone post a new message in that channel and then ask him to delete it - return to the channel - send a message
